attributes.action: create mandatory sentencing of one year in prison for individuals who organise and arrange dog fighting events,and six months for attendees of such events.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The toughest sentences that can be handed out currently, to dog fight organisors is six months in prison,while some who are caught and convicted are merely handed a fine.Those who are caught spectating at such events are at most handed fines.I recommend a doubling of current sentences with regard to the act of organising and arranging dog fights, and/or training dogs for the purposes of fighting for sport .Simaltaneously mandatory custodial sentences for those convicted of attending these events,will serve to deter potential audiences of dog fights.Such systematically trained dogs also become more dangerous to members of the public,and their pets.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "create mandatory sentencing of one year in prison for individuals who organise and arrange dog fighting events,and six months for attendees of such events."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17149
